publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 48
ab.l: Šira da miźmor ulanlarynyn Qoraḥnyn. Ulludur H da maḥtalɣandyr astry šaharynda Teńrimiźniń aziź tavynda.
Ḱorkĺu valajat bijańči bar ol jerniń tavy Cijjonnun qyryjlary cafonnun šahary ullu Bjniń.
Ki muna ol bijĺar yštyryldy- lar aštylar bird́ań.
Alar ḱord́uĺar alajoḥ tamaša et́tiĺar al- ɣasyndylar adadylar.
Tit́ŕavik tuttu alarny anda syzlav t́orejdoɣon qatyn kibik.

Jeli byla qadymnyn syndyrdyj
alarny
ǵeŕab́ĺariń Taršišniń.
Ki ńečik ešit́tik alej ḱord́uk šaharynda Teńrimiźniń Teńri t́uźu- gej any dunjaɣa dejiń hamḿeš́a.
Išanabyz e Teńri ševaɣatyja orta- synda sarajyjnyn.
Ńečik šemij śeniń e Teńri alej maḥtavyj qyryjlary üśt́uńa jerniń rastlyḥ toludur on ḱuč́uj śeniń.
Bijanir tavy Cijjon- nun quvanyrlar ǯymaty Juhudanyn t́oŕaĺarij üč́uń śeniń.
Ajlanyjyz Cijjonɣa da quršajyz any sanajyz kerḿańĺariń anyn.
Qojujuz čalmanyna bijik etijiź sarajlaryn anyn üč́uń ki jomaḥlagejlar sondraɣy dorɣa.
Ki bu Teńri Teńrimiź dunjaɣa dejiń ol ḱońd́arir biźni öĺǵuńč́a. כִי זֶה אֱלֹהִים אֱלֹהֵינוּ עוֹלָם וָעֶד הוּא יְנַהֲגֵנוּ עַל מוּת ׃
